channel.title: maybe on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in maybe on Barefoot Rob

item.title: might try to set up Fossil on Dreamhost
item.description: 11:30 Sunday 15 April 2018 JST I found an article about setting up Fossil on Dreamhost, and may try to go through it today. First, I will set up a new sub-domain and new user on Dreamhost. 12:07 Done. I recognize that I am using git on a server for Fossil, but am going to ignore that for now. Though the previous article compiled from source, it appears Fossil provides Linux binaries now.

item.title: Liz English School
item.description: 13:05 Tuesday 24 October 2017 JST Met Yaw for the first time at Liz English School. He and I got on quite well, and even shared a prayer for world peace and supporting our community and family. I look forward to working closely with him in the future.

item.title: to do today
item.description: 10:31 Saturday 16 May 2015 JST study Japanese for an hour look at CB tickets for an hour Check Chika’s transcript for an hour look at AB tickets for an hour add menus to pong game for an hour plan AB server update do not stay up until 1 million o’clock reality: texted Nate til 10:42 studied Japanese til 10:47 5 mins texted Alfonzo til 10:52 studied Japanese prefectures til 11:11 15 mins did 27 pushups til 11:14 (total 255 in two days yay) studied Japanese adjectives til 11:24 (著しい!
